bug.author: WenheLI
bug.description: When running the following commands to generate a modelDefine plugin template: pipcook plugin-dev --type modelDefine --name tensorflow-rnn-model-define the system will throw the following error: Error: ENOENT: no such file or directory, copyfile '/usr/local/lib/node_modules/@pipcook/pipcook-cli/dist/assets/pluginPackage/src/modelDefine.ts' suggesting the template for modelDefine does not exist.

comments.comment: Thanks for the catch, BTW we have another plan to use the project instead of self-maintained templates at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alibaba/pipcook/issues/154>#154</denchmark-link> .
